The good folks over at Yazoo Brewery are celebrating 2,000 Twitter followers by hosting a tweet-up (that’s Twitter-speak for a plain old meet up, in case you were wondering) tonight. But before you start heading over to the taproom, you should probably know that the Yazoo tweet-up is not actually at the Yazoo brewery. It’s tonight, from 6-8pm at the Melrose Neighborhood Pub, and there will be $2 pint specials, fancy-schmancy Yazoo pint glasses for the first 150 beers purchased, a keg of Sue (mmmmm…) and lots of beer-loving Twitter users having a great time.

Our regular readers already know that we can’t resist a tweet-up (or a frosty pint of Yazoo… or two), so follow @YazooBrew to get more details, and we’ll see you tonight. Cheers!
